query:
UPDATE
                    tasks t
                SET
                    completed_at = CASE
                        WHEN $3 THEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'UTC'
                        ELSE NULL
                    END
                WHERE
                    t.id = $2 AND
                    -- Permission check
                    (
                        -- Viewer is responsible
                        t.responsible_user_id = $1 OR
                        -- Viewer is in task group
                        EXISTS (
                            SELECT
                            FROM
                                users_groups ug
                            WHERE
                                ug.group_id = t.group_id AND
                                ug.user_id = $1
                        )
                    )
                RETURNING
                    completed_at
